WebGrid.js

* Single Page Application Framework for Web Grid Computing
Build on top of Node's Connect and Express.

* Default Development Stack
MongoDB (database)
Redis (background jobs)
Stylus
Jasmine
knockout.js

* Install
install webgrid -g

* Generator
webgrid your_project
cd your_project

* Structure
Here's how you might organize a blog:
.
|--app
|   |--views
|   |--config
`server.js
